Armour.Name: Shadow Mantle
Armour.Description: A cloak that seems to absorb light, perfect for those who wish to move unseen.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Greatly reduces the chance of being detected by enemies

Armour.Name: Boots of Silence
Armour.Description: Boots that muffle the footsteps of the wearer, allowing for silent movement.

Armour.Name: Mask of the Phantom
Armour.Description: A mask that obscures the wearer's face, instilling fear into the hearts of their enemies.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Intimidates lower-level enemies, preventing them from attacking
